column3: iyi nye nwoma a otsia ebien a makyerɛw abrɛ hom; no mu na mikenyan hom adwen gyenengyenen wɔ nkaabɔ mu;"

column2: "dɛ hom nkaa nsɛm a nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no aka ato hɔ
column3: nye Ewuradze nye Agyenkwa ahyɛdze a ɔnam hom asomafo do no."
nda a odzi ekyir no mu atwetwesifo dze atwetwesi bɛba a wɔnantsew hɔnankasa hɔn akɔndɔ ekyir
Ne mbae anohoba no wɔ hen? Osiandɛ ofi da a egyanom dedae yi adze nyina tse dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse fi abɔdze ahyɛse no ara."

column2: "Na wɔhyɛ da ara ma hɔn werɛ fir dɛ
column3: ofi tsetse na ɔsor wɔ hɔ
column4: nye asaase a ofi nsu mu
column5: na ofi nsu finimfin betsiim hɔ wɔ Nyankopɔn n’asɛm do:"

column2: "ɔno no do na ɔnam na wiadze a ɔwɔ ber no mu no

column3: nye asaase no wɔdze n’asɛm kor no ara akora do ama ogya
column4: esie atsɛmbu nye nyimpa emumuyɛfo hɔn sɛɛ da no."

column2: "Na mma hom werɛ mmfir adze kor yi
column4: dɛ da kor yɛ Ewuradze dɛ mfe apem
column5: na mfe apem yɛ no dɛ da kor."

column2: "Ewuradze nnyɛ n’anohoba ho ekyim dɛ mbrɛ binom bu no ekyimyɛ no
column3: na mbom penkyɛr na ɔyɛ no wɔ hom do
column5: na mbom ɔpɛ dɛ hɔn nyina bɛba nnuhu mu."

column2: "Na Ewuradze da no bɛba dɛ owifo; no mu na sor dze dede kɛse botwa mu akɔ
column3: na wimu adze dze ɔhyew a ɔyɛ dzen bɛnan
column4: na asaase nye no mu ndwuma wɔbɛhyew no."

column2: "Ntsi sɛ iyinom nyina bɛsɛɛ dɛm a
column3: nyimpa su bɛn na ɔsɛ dɛ hom yɛ
column4: wɔ abrabɔ krɔnkrɔn nye nyamesompa mu
column6: "ber a hom rohwɛ kwan na hom repɛ Nyankopɔn da no ne mbae ntsɛm yi? Ɔno mu na gya bɔtɔ ɔsor mu asɛɛ no
column7: na wimu adze dze hyew a ɔyɛ dzen bɛnan no."

column3: hɛn enyi da sor fofor nye asaase fofor a tsenenee tse mu no kwan."

column4: osiandɛ hom enyi da yinom kwan ntsi
column7: dɛ nkekaa anaa dzɛm nnyi hom ho wɔ n’enyim."

column2: "Na hom mbu dɛ Nyankopɔn penkyɛr yɛ nkwagye
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɛn nua dɔfo Paul so dze nyansa a wɔdze maa no no kyerɛɛw hom no;"

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛe wɔ no nwoma nyina a ɔka iyinom ho nsɛm wɔ mu no mu so; no mu na asɛm a ne ntseasee yɛ dzen wɔ a
column6: dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛ kyerɛwsɛm nkaa no so dze ma hɔnankasa hɔn sɛɛ."
amma wɔaammfa emumuyɛ ndaadaasɛm ammpra hom annkɔ
column7: na hom eemmfi homankasa hom tsim a hom etsim mu annhwe ase."

column2: "Na mbom hom nnyin wɔ adom nye hɛn Ewuradze nye Agyenkwa Jesus Kraest nyimdzee mu. Ɔno na enyimnyam nka no sesei nye daa. [Amen.]"
